column1: Little Goat Diner////We came here to celebrate a birthday. We had a private room upstairs with a bar
column3: and access to the roof deck. The evening started with drinks and some dips
column4: then we sat down for a creative and exciting dinner. I ate more food than I thought possible. Salad
column8: goat and more..one of the desserts was this fantastic whipped sesame and pineapple thing...oh my gosh. I had two. We were able to talk with the chefs between courses and watch them prepare. The environment was friendly and relaxed; waiters were attentive (crucial: when needed). Lovely design
